name: The Perpetual Powers of Tau Ceremony
description: The Perpetual Powers of Tau ceremony has been running since 2019. The ceremony output is available to the community, and has been used by many projects. We'll take a look at the history and current state of the ceremony, and the novel ways people find to generate entropy.

speakers.name: Geoff Lamperd
speakers.bio: I've been working on Ethereum projects since 2018. Since 2020 I've been with PSE and working on a variety of projects, but mostly Trusted Setup infrastructure for phase 1, phase 2, and KZG ceremonies.
